talents.option1: 50% chance of Anchor Smash on attack

abilities.desc: Summons a gush of water to damage an enemy unit, reducing their movement speed and armor.
abilities.name: Gush

abilities.desc: Thickens Tidehunter's hide to passively block a portion of any incoming physical attack damage. The hide also removes negative status effects if the damage taken crosses a threshold.Does not stack with items that provide Damage Block.DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel
abilities.name: Kraken Shell
abilities.notes: Kraken Shell removes most debuffs, even if they are generally not purgable.

abilities.desc: Tidehunter swings his mighty anchor to attack and deal bonus damage to nearby enemies and reduce their attack damage.
abilities.name: Anchor Smash
abilities.notes: Anchor Smash works on all Ancient creeps except for Roshan.

abilities.desc: Tidehunter unleashes a targeted slew of tentacles that damage and stun enemies within reach. The tentacles deal 50% of Ravage's damage and stun, with a range 75% of Ravage's radius.
abilities.name: Tendrils of the Deep

abilities.desc: Slams the ground, causing tentacles to erupt in all directions, damaging and stunning all nearby enemy units.
abilities.name: Ravage
abilities.notes: Ravage waves move outwards at a speed of 725.
